```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.dim = c(4, 3))
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

## Data

Get an SAD (here, using the `meteR::arth` data; substitute here to use a different community)

```{r}

sad_long <- meteR::arth

sad_counts <- sad_long %>%
  group_by(spp) %>%
  tally() %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  mutate(rank = dplyr::row_number()) %>%
  rename(abundance = n) %>%
  select(rank, abundance) %>%
  group_by(abundance) %>%
  mutate(nspp = dplyr::n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(prop_spp = nspp / max(rank))

head(sad_counts)

```

## Visualizing SADs

### Histogram

```{r}

sad_histogram <- ggplot(sad_counts, aes(abundance)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  xlab("Abundance") +
  ylab("Frequency") +
  ggtitle("Histogram")

sad_histogram
```


### PMF

```{r}

sad_pmfplot <- ggplot(sad_counts %>% select(abundance, prop_spp) %>% distinct(), aes(abundance, prop_spp)) +
  geom_col()

sad_pmfplot

```

### Rank-abundance plot

```{r}

sad_rankplot <- ggplot(sad_counts, aes(rank, abundance)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Rank") +
  ylab("Abundance") +
  ggtitle("Rank-abundance plot")


sad_rankplot




sad_rankplot_log <- ggplot(sad_counts, aes(log(rank), log(abundance))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Rank (log)") +
  ylab("Abundance (log)") +
  ggtitle("Rank-abundance plot (log-log)") 


sad_rankplot_log
```

### Cumulative distribution function

```{r}

sad_ecdf <- ecdf(sad_counts$abundance)

sad_counts <- sad_counts %>%
  mutate(cdf = sad_ecdf(abundance))

cdf_plot <- ggplot(sad_counts, aes(abundance, cdf)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Abundance") +
  ylab("Cumulative density") +
  ggtitle("CDF") +
  ylim(0, 1)


sad_pmfplot

cdf_plot


cdf_plot_log <- ggplot(sad_counts, aes(log(abundance), cdf)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Abundance (log)") +
  ylab("Cumulative density") +
  ggtitle("CDF (log)") +
  ylim(0, 1)

cdf_plot_log

```

## Fitted distributions

* Logseries (Fisher, METE, neutral)
* Lognormal 
* Power law
* Negative binomial

```{r}
library(sads)
logseries <- sads::fitls(sad_counts$abundance)
plot(logseries)

sad_logseries_pred <- sad_counts %>%
  mutate(logseries_pred = radpred(logseries)$abund)

ggplot(sad_logseries_pred, aes(rank, abundance)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(y = logseries_pred)) 

```
